title: Slay belle kat bugged?
body:
her w animation is different (i think its the old kat w animation) no problem with that the thing is her ult animation which looks weird compared to other skins and original model 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LpMisqVuCbc = Slay belle
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NXBX8MP0vo0 = Red card (example)
the dagger one is hard to see

replies.body:
I can only see minor differences in the animations, but it might just be a design choice.
Can you give me details on what you're seeing differently between the two specifically?
I guess I'm not seeing it. What exactly is the problem? It all looks fine to me.
